snippet: The CBS letter stops short of announcing a lawsuit; instead, it says ABC and the producers "will be acting at their own peril" if they proceed. However, so far, lawsuits over reality TV have never succeeded.
abstract: The CBS letter stops short of announcing a lawsuit; instead, it says ABC and the producers "will be acting at their own peril" if they proceed. However, so far, lawsuits over reality TV have never succeeded.

headline.main: CBS Threatens ABC Over 'Glass House,' a 'Big Brother'-Like TV Show
